events.message: I am reporting a car accident that occurred yesterday when another vehicle hit my bumper at a stoplight.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial details about the vehicle collision.
An insurance agent has been assigned to oversee and assist with your auto accident claim process.
Your auto accident claim has been officially acknowledged and entered into our system for further processing.
Please provide a copy of the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and your driver's license for claim verification.
All requested documents, including the accident police report and vehicle photos, have been submitted successfully.
Our claims investigation team has started reviewing the submitted materials and contacting involved parties.
The investigation into the auto accident claim has been completed, establishing liability and damage extent.
A settlement proposal has been prepared based on repair estimates and coverage limits for your damaged vehicle.
You have accepted the settlement offer and provided positive feedback regarding the claim handling process.
The auto accident claim has been officially approved and is now eligible for payment issuance.
Payment covering vehicle repair costs has been issued to your bank account as per settlement agreement.
The auto accident claim case has been closed successfully after payment issuance and final confirmation.
All files and documentation related to the auto accident claim have been archived for future reference.
